name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: Trump portrayed Khan as an official with his head in the sand about the attacks that disrupted his city. The reality is the president plucked five words from the mayor’s longer message that condemned the terrorist acts and explained why Londoners would see an increased police presence in the coming days. Khan was not saying there is "no reason to be alarmed," period,  by the attack -- he was pre-empting concerns about what law enforcement presence might mean in the days to come.
